events.comment: When starting the scene, assign the first move to a random player 0 or 1, where 0 is X, and 1 is O
Check whose move and set the appropriate animation to the block
Find out programmatically in which cell is X
Find out programmatically in which cell is O
If one of the variations is true, then set the text object to X won
If one of the variations is true, then set the text object to O won
